title: Hi, I am Google Pixel 2XL user in Indonesia. I broke my lcd and now my phone screwn is not working.
content: i have taken out the simcard once and it was back to normal. But then i accidentally put the phone in the water for quite a while. The the screen color changed and suddelny it stopped. I could still hear my alarm on but the screen is blank. I need to repair my phone but as i understand there is no cust service in indonesia. What should i do?
